title: Telephones Sound Effect Pack Vol 1
description: Do you remember the 80’s 90’s phones? This collection includes 2 rotary dial-up and 7 push-button phones with associated sounds.
longDescription:
Do you remember the 80’s 90’s phones?

This collection includes 2 rotary dial-up and 7 push-button phones with associated sounds.


I had a few retro push-button and dial phones. I thought I should definitely do a sound collection, because old objects are dying out and productions set in older times often need such sounds.


This sound effect collection is ideal for use in game software, applications, commercials, movies, TV shows,

videos, animation, and any other entertainment industry where a high-quality audio effect is essential.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  310 Retro telephone sound effect.
  • Excellent for productions and scenes where classic phones are used. 

Number of Audio Waves: 310

Number of Audio Cues: 310

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit / Mono-Stereo

Do Sound FX loop: One shot and Loop sounds

Minutes of audio provided: 08min 33sec

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation and Audio Demo : https://soundcloud.com/deb-sound-com/telephones-vol1-preview
